description: Number of Gaussian integers z=a+bi satisfying n-1/2<|z|<=n+1/2.
comments: Number of integer cartesian grid points covered by a ring around the origin with width 1 and outer radius n+0.5. - _Ralf Stephan_, Nov 28 2013
links: Index entries for Gaussian integers and primes
prog: (PARI) a(n)=sum(i=-n, n, sum(j=-n, n, d=sqrt(i*i+j*j); if(d>=n-1/2&&d<=n+1/2, 1))) \\ _Ralf Stephan_, Nov 28 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
